hanzi-su-wiki:
沖

Значения

Открытое море

Мнемоника

Буквально — посредине 中 воды 氵, т.е. очень далеко от берега.

Варианты

冲, 衝
purpleculture_pinyin:
chōng
(of water) to dash against; to mix with water; to infuse; to rinse; to flush; to develop (a film); to rise in the air; to clash; to collide with
(воды), чтобы броситься; смешать с водой; настаивать; полоскать; смывать; проявить (пленка); подняться в воздух; столкнуться; столкнуться с

heisig_chinese_memo: Open sea is a lot of water in the middle of nowhere. People think it can wash away all the garbage but it can't.
heisig_constituent: open sea, water, water droplets, water pistol, in, stick, mouth
heisig_story: This kanji could hardly be simpler. The key word open sea readily suggests being out in the middle of a great body of water .Thinking of it in this way should avoid confusion with the kanji for "open," which we will meet later on.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: open sea, offing, rise high into sky
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: открытое море, невдалеке, поднимается высоко в небо
koohiiStory1: Open sea is a lot of water in the middle of nowhere.
koohiiStory2: Water in the middle of the ocean is referred to as open sea.
kunYomi: おき、おきつ、ちゅう.する、わく
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There is a tsunami in the middle of the open sea. Luckily there are no ships around, so the tsunami in the middle of the open sea is not damaging to anyone.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at this tsunami in the middle of the open sea. When the tsunami isn’t destroying things and is just out there in the open sea it looks really majestic and pretty.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Someone dares you to go out to the open sea and surf on the middle of the tsunami. “Oki (おき) doki,” you reply. You can’t refuse a dare. Every time someone dares you to do something, you always respond with “oki doki”.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You really regret saying oki doki this time. You don’t want to surf on a tsunami in the middle of the open sea. Imagine doing so. It’s terrifying and wet and you don’t even know how to surf. You’re going to die.
Ru_Meaning: open sea, offing, rise high into sky
Ru_trainchinese:
chōng: (глаг) мыть; проявлять (фотографии); заливать кипятком, заваривать
chōng: (графема) важное место, проезд, путь сообщения
chòng: (предлог) по направлению к, в сторону
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the middle (中) of the water (氵) is the open sea
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You're likely to collide with someone if you are in the middle of an ice rink.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the ' water ' from the ' in ', as the water hit " in the " form of the word, " the " sound character is also, the original meaning of water impact. "Shuowen": "Chong, sway. From the water, from the water. Reading is like moving."

The word " Chong " oracle bone inscription is suspected to be used as a name. "Collection" 32906: "Ling (Ming) Chong", seems to mean commanding Chong. The inscription of the word " Chong " is found in Chongziding: "Chongzi 𡄹zhixingzhen (ding)." Chen Mengjia and Lin Jieming think it should be pronounced " child ", and "chongzi" means "boy". One said that " Chong " was the last name.

There are also examples of " Chong " pronounced " Tong " in handed down documents, such as "Shang Shu. "Pangeng 2": "Chong people wantonly." The biography of Kong Anguo: "Chong, children. Tong people, modest." It shows that "Chong people" are the ancients who called themselves ignorant. Another example is "Shang Shu. "Zhaogao": "Today Chong's children will have no survivors." Kong Anguo Chuan: "Boys, make the king less, heirs to govern the government." "Chongzi" means "boy," and he claims to be a king. The whole sentence refers to that he is young and heirs now and will not violate the teachings of the elderly and elders. The inscriptions also use "Shen Zi" to mean "Chong Zi", see " Shen ".

" Chong " in the Warring States script is found in Jinxi and is used as a surname.

The word " Chong " is still used for water pouring, such as washing and tea making. As for Chongxu, the original word for " Chong " is " Zhu ", Duan Yucai's "Shuowen Jiezi Zhu": "Anyone who uses Chongxu is the guise of "Chong"." See " Chu ".

The words " chong " and " chong " are combined into " chong " in simplified Chinese characters. The original meaning of " Chong " is channel, which is different from " Chong ".
humanum_short_description_en: From the ' water ' from the ' in ', as the water hit " in the " form of the word, " the " sound character is also, the original meaning of water impact.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」從「中」，象水流撞擊「中」字之形，「中」亦是聲符，本義為水沖擊。《說文》：「沖，涌搖也。从水、中。讀若動。」

　　「沖」字甲骨文疑用作人名。《合集》32906：「令(命)沖」，似是命令沖的意思。「沖」字金文見於沖子鼎：「沖子𡄹之行貞(鼎)。」陳夢家、林潔明認為當讀作「童」，「沖子」即「童子」。一說以為「沖」是姓氏。

　　傳世文獻也有「沖」讀作「童」的例子，如《尚書．盤庚下》：「肆予沖人。」孔安國傳：「沖，童。童人，謙也。」說明「沖人」是古人謙稱自己幼小無知。又如《尚書．召誥》：「今沖子嗣，則無遺壽耈。」孔安國傳：「童子，言成王少，嗣位治政。」「沖子」即「童子」，為成王自稱。全句指現在自己年少嗣位，不會違背老人長輩的教誨。金文又以「沈子」表示「沖子」，參見「沈」。

　　戰國文字中「沖」見於晉璽，用為姓氏。

　　「沖」字現在仍解作用水澆注，如沖洗、沖茶等。至於沖虛之「沖」的本字是「盅」，段玉裁《說文解字注》：「凡用沖虛字者，皆盅之假借。」參見「盅」。

　　「沖」、「衝」二字在簡化字中合併為「冲」。「衝」的本義為通道，與「沖」不同。
humanum_short_description: 從「水」從「中」，象水流撞擊「中」字之形，「中」亦是聲符，本義為水沖擊。

English Definition: (of water) to dash against; to mix with water; to infuse; to rinse; to flush; to develop (a film); to rise in the air; to clash; to collide with
Total strokes: 7; Radical: 水
Pictophonetic: 中 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 中 [ zhōng ] central; center, middle; amidst; to hit (target), to attain; China; Chinese

衝擊 [ chōng jī ]: to attack; to batter; (of waves) to pound against; shock; impact
衝動 [ chōng dòng ]: to have an urge; to be impetuous; impulse; urge
衝鋒 [ chōng fēng ]: to charge; to assault; assault
沖天 [ chōng tiān ]: to soar; to rocket

Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 中 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 中 [ zhōng ] central; center, middle; amidst; to hit (target), to attain; China; Chinese
①用水或酒澆注，水撞擊：沖茶。沖劑。沖洗。衝蕩。
②向上鑽，直上：衝騰。衝入雲霄。
③破解不祥：沖喜。
④空虛，謙虛：“大盈若衝，其用不窮”。衝挹。謙沖。
⑤幼小：沖昧。沖弱。沖齡。
⑥方言，山區的平地：韶山沖。
⑦通行的大路，重要的地方：要衝。首當其衝。
⑧不顧一切，一直向前：衝鋒。橫衝直撞。
⑨猛烈地撞擊：衝力。衝突。
⑩收支賬目互相抵銷：衝賬。
⑾情感強烈：衝動。興(xìng)沖沖。
⑿太陽系中，除水星和金星外，其餘的某一個行星進行到與地球、太陽成一條直線而地球正處在這個行星與太陽之間的位置時稱“衝”。

沖(おき): open sea

從「 水 」從「 中 」，象水流撞擊「 中 」字之形，「 中 」亦是聲符，本義為水沖擊。《說文》：「沖，涌搖也。从水、中。讀若動。」 「 沖 」字甲骨文疑用作人名。《合集》32906：「令(命)沖」，似是命令沖的意思。「 沖 」字金文見於沖子鼎：「沖子𡄹之行貞(鼎)。」陳夢家、林潔明認為當讀作「 童 」，「沖子」即「童子」。一說以為「 沖 」是姓氏。 傳世文獻也有「 沖 」讀作「 童 」的例子，如《尚書．盤庚下》：「肆予沖人。」孔安國傳：「沖，童。童人，謙也。」說明「沖人」是古人謙稱自己幼小無知。又如《尚書．召誥》：「今沖子嗣，則無遺壽耈。」孔安國傳：「童子，言成王少，嗣位治政。」「沖子」即「童子」，為成王自稱。全句指現在自己年少嗣位，不會違背老人長輩的教誨。金文又以「沈子」表示「沖子」，參見「 沈 」。 戰國文字中「 沖 」見於晉璽，用為姓氏。 「 沖 」字現在仍解作用水澆注，如沖洗、沖茶等。至於沖虛之「 沖 」的本字是「 盅 」，段玉裁《說文解字注》：「凡用沖虛字者，皆盅之假借。」參見「 盅 」。 「 沖 」、「 衝 」二字在簡化字中合併為「 冲 」。「 衝 」的本義為通道，與「 沖 」不同。
From the ' water ' from the ' in ', as the water hit " in the" form of the word, " the" sound character is also, the original meaning of water impact. "Shuowen": "Chong, sway. From the water, from the water. Reading is like moving." The word " Chong" oracle bone inscription is suspected to be used as a name. "Collection" 32906: "Ling (Ming) Chong", seems to mean commanding Chong. The inscription of the word " Chong" is found in Chongziding: "Chongzi 𡄹zhixingzhen (ding)." Chen Mengjia and Lin Jieming think it should be pronounced " child", and "chongzi" means "boy". One said that " Chong" was the last name. There are also examples of " Chong" pronounced " Tong" in handed down documents, such as "Shang Shu. "Pangeng 2": "Chong people wantonly." The biography of Kong Anguo: "Chong, children. Tong people, modest." It shows that "Chong people" are the ancients who called themselves ignorant. Another example is "Shang Shu. "Zhaogao": "Today Chong's children will have no survivors." Kong Anguo Chuan: "Boys, make the king less, heirs to govern the government." "Chongzi" means "boy," and he claims to be a king. The whole sentence refers to that he is young and heirs now and will not violate the teachings of the elderly and elders. The inscriptions also use "Shen Zi" to mean "Chong Zi", see " Shen". " Chong" in the Warring States script is found in Jinxi and is used as a surname. The word " Chong" is still used for water pouring, such as washing and tea making. As for Chongxu, the original word for " Chong" is " Zhu", Duan Yucai's "Shuowen Jiezi Zhu": "Anyone who uses Chongxu is the guise of "Chong"." See " Chu". The words " chong" and " chong" are combined into " chong" in simplified Chinese characters. The original meaning of " Chong" is channel, which is different from " Chong".

沖字的基本解释

沖
chōng
同“冲1”。

沖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chōng］
［《廣韻》直弓切，平東，澄。］
亦作“冲1”。亦作“祌2”。“衶1”的被通假字。
(1)涌摇。
(2)快速地向上或向前直闯。参见“沖天”。
(3)谓以水、酒等浇注。
(4)冲击；冲洗。参见“沖激”、“沖決”。
(5)冒犯，顶撞。参见“沖言沖語”。
(6)旧时星相术数家谓相忌相克。
(7)谓破解凶运。
(8)山区里的平地。
(9)淡泊；谦和。
(10)幼小。
(11)调和。
(12)冒充；充当。
(13)通“盅”。空虚。
(14)通“忡”。参见“沖沖”。

沖字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　沖； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页611第18
【唐韻】直弓切【集韻】【韻會】持中切，?音蟲。【說文】涌搖也。　又【玉篇】虛也。【老子·道德經】大盈若沖。　又【廣韻】和也，深也。【蕭慤詩】重明豈凝滯，無累在淵沖。　又飛也。【史記·滑稽傳】一飛沖天。　又幼小也。【書·盤庚】肆予沖人。【傳】沖，童也。　又垂飾貌。【詩·小雅】䩦革沖沖。　又聲也。【詩·豳風】鑿冰沖沖。　又姓。明洪武中香山縣丞沖敬。　又【集韻】杜孔切，音動。涌也。　又【韻補】叶仲良切，音長。【道藏歌】鬱鬱對啓明，圓華煥三沖。飇粲麗九天，天綠繞丹房。

沖字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
沖字的起名意思

暂无。

Name meaning

chōng
вм. 冲
Radicals: 氵, 中  (tsunami, middle)
Meaning Mnemonic
There is a tsunami in the middle of the open sea. Luckily there are no ships around, so the tsunami in the middle of the open sea is not damaging to anyone.
Look at this tsunami in the middle of the open sea. When the tsunami isn’t destroying things and is just out there in the open sea it looks really majestic and pretty.
Reading Mnemonic
Someone dares you to go out to the open sea and surf on the middle of the tsunami. “Oki (おき) doki,” you reply. You can’t refuse a dare. Every time someone dares you to do something, you always respond with “oki doki”.
You really regret saying oki doki this time. You don’t want to surf on a tsunami in the middle of the open sea. Imagine doing so. It’s terrifying and wet and you don’t even know how to surf. You’re going to die.
